subject: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are ready to lend you some cash
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
$428,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this plain form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://hodestone.com/
